title: PASSWORD CHANGE REQUIRED URGENTLY
body:
I have forgotten how to access my email that i originally signed up with on league and need to change my passowrd as i fear someone has learned my account details. 
<REDACTED PERSONAL INFO>
If you need more details to be provided for the password change i will be able to provide them, hopefully this will be resolved soon.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I've gone ahead and removed the personal details from your post as this only serves to provide further attack vectors for someone to gain access to your account.

You'll need to [contact support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to begin the account recovery process, we here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.
